com.devwebsphere.jdbc.loader
Class GenericJDBCLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.devwebsphere.jdbc.loader.BaseJDBCLoader
      com.devwebsphere.jdbc.loader.GenericJDBCLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
SetLoaderOperations, com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.Loader
Direct Known Subclasses:
SetItemJDBCLoader
public class GenericJDBCLoader
extends BaseJDBCLoader
implements com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.Loader, SetLoaderOperations

This is a first attempt at a generic purequery Loader for POJOs. It expects a POJO that has public field attributes. Some of these are annotated the WXS Id annotation to indicate key fields in the database. The database table is specified using the table name attribute. The POJO attribute names must be the same as the database table column names.

Author:
bnewport

batchUpdate

public void batchUpdate(com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.TxID tx,
                        com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.LogSequence ls)
                 throws com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.LoaderException,
                        com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.OptimisticCollisionException
This is called to write changes at the end of a transaction or a flush to the backend this Loader works with which in this case in a database. We use purequery to flush everything in a single batch statement. Purequery does the POJO attribute to SQL parameter work for us.

Specified by:
batchUpdate in interface com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.Loader
Throws:
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.LoaderException
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.OptimisticCollisionException

get

public List get(com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.TxID tx,
                List keys,
                boolean arg2)
         throws com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.LoaderException
This is called when a client looks up a key which isn't contained in the grid. The grid then calls this method to fetch the values for the keys. If a key doesn't exist in the backend then Loader.KEY_NOT_FOUND is returned.

Specified by:
get in interface com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.Loader
Throws:
com.ibm.websphere.objectgrid.plugins.LoaderException
